QuestData.Title: Foul Fertilizer
QuestData.Description: The Bonefleet wants nothing more than to spread their undead curse onto dry land. Like a sickness, it will slowly overtake the landscape if left unchecked.$B$BThe stench of undeath permeates the barrels of fertilizer they use to sow their dread crops. They are the source of the spreading plague, and must be destroyed.
QuestData.RewardText: Thinking what goes into normal fertilizer, I don't even want to know what was in THAT stuff.
